message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "Using the Global Findex database, we investigate the impact of financial education on individuals' financial knowledge and behavior in low- and middle-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Findex"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses panel data from a representative sample of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Vietnam to investigate the effects of tax administration reform on SME compliance behavior and firm performance.", "dataset": ["panel data", "small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We compare health care utilization and out-of-pocket costs by income groups using two waves of the Indonesia Family Life Survey (IFLS).", "dataset": ["Indonesia Family Life Survey (IFLS)"], "topic": ["Health", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "Using cross-country firm-level survey data from the World Bank Enterprise Surveys, we investigate the relationship between innovation and competition.", "dataset": ["World Bank Enterprise Surveys"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "This paper examines the role of access to digital finance and business training in sustaining smallholder farming in Rwanda using data from the TechnoServe-IYF Rural Livelihood Development Program.", "dataset": ["TechnoServe-IYF Rural Livelihood Development Program"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Digital Development"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze the determinants of internet usership among older adults by exploiting variation in internet availability using data from the Health and Retirement Study.", "dataset": ["Health and Retirement Study"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "using a panel of 42 developing countries over a 30 year period, this paper investigates the relationship between government debt and economic growth.", "dataset": ["panel of 42 developing countries"], "topic": ["Debt", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This study explores dietary habits among children aged 6-23 months using data from the Zambia Demographic and Health Survey (DHS).", "dataset": ["Zambia Demographic and Health Survey (DHS)"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "We use the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture from sub-Saharan African countries to investigate factors that affect agricultural productivity.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We examine the relationship between urbanization and CO2 emissions using cross-country panel data from the World Development Indicators dataset, controlling for other relevant variables such as income and energy consumption.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators dataset"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Urban Development"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "Using the Global Findex database, we investigate the impact of financial education on individuals' financial knowledge and behavior in low- and middle-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Findex"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "This study uses panel data from a representative sample of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Vietnam to investigate the effects of tax administration reform on SME compliance behavior and firm performance.", "dataset": ["panel data", "small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs)"], "topic": a 30 year period, this paper investigates the relationship between government debt and economic growth.", "dataset": ["panel of 42 developing countries"], "topic": ["Debt", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This study explores dietary habits among children aged 6-23 months using data from the Zambia Demographic and Health Survey (DHS).", "dataset": ["Zambia Demographic and Health Survey (DHS)"], "topic": ["Nutrition"]}, {"sentence": "We use the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture from sub-Saharan African countries to investigate factors that affect agricultural productivity.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We examine the relationship between urbanization and CO2 emissions using cross-country panel data from the World Development Indicators dataset, controlling for other relevant variables such as income and energy consumption.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators dataset"], "topic": ["Climate Change", "Urban Development"]}]
